UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Isolation and structural characterization of capistruin, a lasso peptide predicted from the genome sequence of Burkholderia thailandensis E264.
Literature.Author: Knappe TA, Linne U, Zirah S, Rebuffat S, Xie X, Marahiel MA
